channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SWARM-404] mvn wildfly-swarm:run should gracefully shutdown when interrupted
item.description:
The behavior of interrupting an app with mvn wildfly-swarm:run is different from java -jar target/app-swarm.jar. The former does not perform a graceful shutdown.

Output of mvn wildfly-swarm:run: 

[INFO] Scanning for projects...
 
[INFO]

[INFO] Building demo 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT

item.summary: mvn wildfly-swarm:run should gracefully shutdown when interrupted

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: https://github.com/wildfly-swarm/wildfly-swarm/commit/232a8989a fixes the issue when running from mvn wildfly-swarm:run. However it does not work when the process is executed in an embedded maven environment. Needs investigation
